channel.title: Musings of Bart Delrue
channel.description: Musings, ramblings and other nonsense by Bart Delrue.

item.title: Presentation: RSS
item.description: I gave a talk on RSS for the web topics course at Odisee: Presentation here.

item.title: Presentation: Webmention
item.description: I gave a talk on the webmention specification for the web topics course at Odisee: Presentation here.

item.title: A Small Shout-Out to My Students
item.description: This semester, a group of students in the web topics advanced elective explored linked data, federated web, ActivityPub, Webmention, and Solid. They also experimented with tools such as three.js, cables.gl, and TouchDesigner to create interactive media projects. LinkedIn-style boasting isnâ€™t my strong suit, but Iâ€™m very proud of the work theyâ€™ve done. I invited them to Courtray for the Wonder creativity festival, to KBR in Brussels to meet Sven Lieber, and to the Wintercircus Ghent for a talk about TouchDesigner.

item.title: More to Come
item.description: As is tradition in January, Iâ€™ve curated a small list of good intentions for 2025. The basic fit will probably be saturated with other well-intentioned people... so Iâ€™ll avoid getting in their way. Whatâ€™s left is a very real desire to share at least one observation with the world through this blog. And yes, I antedated this post so the one above wouldnâ€™t look lonely.
